## Public Member Functions

### foreachCallee() {#a74989f177f26936f08807b48399e8957}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AttributorAttributes.cpp&#125;::AAIndirectCallInfoCallSite::foreachCallee (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt; bool(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;)&gt; CB) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Call \\CB on each potential callee value and return true if all were known and <code>CB</code> returned true on all of them.

Otherwise, return false.

### trackStatistics() {#aa7c3619f92392c1740dd0d36bff6203c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AttributorAttributes.cpp&#125;::AAIndirectCallInfoCallSite::trackStatistics () const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Hook to enable custom statistic tracking, called after manifest that resulted in a change if statistics are enabled.

We require subclasses to provide an implementation so we remember to add statistics for them.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/attributorattributes-cpp/#l12492">12492</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/attributorattributes-cpp">AttributorAttributes.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### updateImpl() {#a554ade21fa5bda8daa3af645c00364b1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ChangeStatus anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AttributorAttributes.cpp&#125;::AAIndirectCallInfoCallSite::updateImpl (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/attributor">Attributor</a> &amp; A)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
The actual update/transfer function which has to be implemented by the derived classes.

If it is called, the environment has changed and we have to determine if the current information is still valid or adjust it otherwise.

\\Return CHANGED if the internal state changed, otherwise UNCHANGED.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/attributorattributes-cpp/#l12227">12227</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/attributorattributes-cpp">AttributorAttributes.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
